name: Insecticide (itch) (SoyBoy1)
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 51. Theme: "Every 10 Seconds". 

In this game, you will play as an exterminator defending a fruit tree farm from ravenous pests. Protect yourself from the incoming hoards of insects with your pesticide gun, pick and plant seeds to grow trees, and harvest fruits for defense/attack buffs. 

Every 10 seconds your planted trees will grow into a new stage, until they are ready to be harvested.
